subject: Football
lead_paragraph: A 21-year-old who was just drafted by an N.F.L. team is handed a “get-out-of-minicamp-free” card, then turned loose for a weekend in Los Angeles.
snippet: A 21-year-old who was just drafted by an N.F.L. team is handed a “get-out-of-minicamp-free” card, then turned loose for a weekend in Los Angeles.
